item.title: How to enable encrypted DNS (DNS-over-HTTPS) in Firefox
item.author: Author
item.description: As explained in a previous article, here is a one of the plethora solution to improve your privacy and your security online dedicated to the Firefox browser. So you’ll have to get your hands dirty, but I know you like that. Don’t worry, it’s as easy as pie ! How does it work ? The DNS protocol works by translating the domain name of any website you visit each day, sending by sending a query to your DNS server.
